entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Esquimalt
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:15 p.m. PDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 13.0Â°C
